html: Epha. Abraham's grandson, who dwelt near his father, Madian, in Arabia, which was famous for camels. (Calmet)—Saba. India mittit ebur, molles sua thura Sabæi? (Geor. i.)— The Arabians embraced the gospel, but never brought their treasures to Jerusalem. (Calmet)— The three kings came on swift beasts to adore Christ, and fulfilled his prophecy, Matthew ii. (Worthington)
